item.title: Backend thinking
item.description: Backend thinking Answer question - note down something valuable Mission of backend What is backend programming? -> Build code that allows a database and an application to communicate with one another. Backend developers take care and maintain the back-end of a website, Including databases, servers, and apps, and they control what you don’t see. What are the differences backend vs frontend programming? The term “front-end” refers to the user interface, while “back-end” means the server, application and database that work behind the scenes to deliver information to the user.
